item.title: Migrating to a static blog with Hugo
item.description: I am in the process of migrating my personal blogging world to a static hosting setup using hugo and ox-hugo. from the gallery of real world example websites generated with ox-hugo I selected that of Daniel Molina as a starting point. Let’s see how this goes….
